lead_paragraph: Former major league catcher Taylor Teagarden, among the athletes accused of using performance-enhancing drugs in a December report by Al Jazeera, was suspended for 80 games on Friday by Major League Baseball.

headline.print_headline: Catcher Teagarden Suspended 80 Games for Drug Violation
headline.main: Catcher Teagarden Suspended 80 Games for Drug Violation
